content.title: Dreamworld reputation in tatters as inquest wraps up - The Guardian
Theme park 'spot checks', devices stripped down in proposal: Inquest - Brisbane Times
content.desc: A major overhaul of all theme park safety including mandatory major inspections has been proposed following the Dreamworld tragedy.

content.title: Dreamworld inquest revelations shock family - Courier Mail
content.desc: THE mother of two victims from the Dreamworld Thunder River Rapids disaster has spoken of her frustration after the conclusion of an inquest into the tragedy.

content.title: Dreamworld’s tiger sisters celebrate third birthday on Tiger Island - Herald Sun
content.desc: DREAMWORLD has celebrated a very special birthday as tigers Adira and Akasha turned three last week.
